= Users =

== Create a user with HOME directory ==
useradd -m -d /PATH/TO/FOLDER USERNAME

== Manually create several users ==
`for USER in user1 user2 user3; do useradd -m -s /bin/bash $USER ; mkdir /home/$USER/.ssh; touch /home/$USER/.ssh/authorized_keys ; chmod 600 /home/$USER/.ssh/authorized_keys; chown -R $USER:$USER /home/$USER ; vi /home/$USER/.ssh/authorized_keys; vigr; done`
